title: Navratna Polki Kundan Jadau Choker Haaram
materials: Seed Pearls. The gold is of exceptional purity
lending a rich luster to the entire piece.
features: Exquisite Jadau setting showcasing the brilliance of Polki diamonds. Features the auspicious Navratna arrangement, meticulously set within a Kundan framework. The choker design is complemented by graceful triangular drops adorned with seed pearls. The use of intricate Nakshi work is evident in the delicate detailing of the gold framework. The piece showcases fine craftsmanship, reflecting the rich heritage of Hyderabad's jewelry tradition.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Its versatility also makes it suitable for formal occasions and special events.
description: A timeless piece embodying the elegance of South Indian heritage. The combination of Polki diamonds and Navratna gemstones bestows prosperity and good fortune. Handcrafted with unparalleled skill by master artisans in Hyderabad. A valuable heirloom to be cherished for generations. This is an investment in artistry and tradition.
